      • setItem

        void setItem​(int index,
             PlayerStorage.Item item)
        Set an item to the given index, basically call PlayerInventory.setItem(int, ItemStack)
        Parameters:
        index - an index to set this item to
        item - an item to set

      • setItem

        default void setItem​(int row,
                     int column,
                     PlayerStorage.Item item)
        Util method to set item with grid values instead of index. You can just set item in player storage and hotbar
        Parameters:
        row - a row belong to [0;3]
        column - a column belong to [1;9]
        item - an item to set
